comments:
When trying to set a breakpoint by double-clicking on the ruler, a
NullPointerException is thrown. It happens in the resource perspective.

How to reproduce:
- start eclipse
- choose resource perspective and reset it
- restart eclipse
- open a java file with currently no errors or breakpoints in it
- double-click on the ruler to create a breakpoint
=> breakpoint is not set, NPE is thrown and shown in Error Log

StackTrace:

Fixed in ToggleBreakpointAction. 

The problem was that the java.debug.ui plug-in was not yet loaded, so 
the "toggle breakpoint adapter" for the editor was not retrieved, resulting in 
the NPE. In this case we can force load the adapter, as the user is requesting 
it.
